SOS Puntarenas is a mobile web application created to strengthen the safety and well-being of people in our region. Our goal is to offer a reliable tool that allows users to react quickly and effectively in an emergency.

 With just one tap, users can send an emergency alert along with their real-time location to their trusted contacts, ensuring that help arrives exactly when it’s needed most.

 The platform is designed to be intuitive, accessible, and efficient, making it easy to use anytime and anywhere. It also allows users to register emergency contacts, review the history of sent alerts, and manage their account with ease.

 At SOS Puntarenas, we believe that technology can save lives when it is used in the service of the community. That’s why we work to provide every user with safety, trust, and peace of mind—always within reach.

Last updated: 11/10/2025

 Welcome to SOS Puntarenas, a mobile web application created to enhance personal safety in the region. By using this platform, you agree to the following terms:

 SOS Puntarenas allows users to send emergency alerts with real-time location to trusted contacts.
 The app does not replace official emergency services. Its purpose is complementary and depends on the proper functioning of the device and internet connection.

 2. User Registration and Responsibility

 To use the app, you must create an account with accurate information and keep it up to date.
 You are responsible for protecting your credentials and for not using the app to send false alerts or for improper purposes.

 3. Privacy and Data

 We collect personal data (such as name, email, and location) only to provide the service.
 We do not share your information with third parties without your consent. You may request deletion of your account and data at any time.

 4. Limitation of Liability

 SOS Puntarenas is not responsible for technical failures, network errors, or any damages resulting from the use of the service.
 The user agrees that the use of the app is at their own risk.

 We may update these terms at any time; continued use of the app implies acceptance of the modifications.
